frontpage.name: Alejandro Valverde Mahou
frontpage.about_me: Student. In Denmark right now studying my Masters. Passionate of Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning, although I like to learn a bit about everything. I studied my bachelors in Computer Science and Engineering in Universidad Carlos III of Madrid, and now I'm studying at DTU the MSc. Human-Centered Artificial Intelligence, in Copenhaguen.

experiences.title: Internship in FrontEnd Development and React
experiences.content: Internship in the company Global Incubator, where I worked in a React FrontEnd project. The internship was in Madrid.

studies.title: Bachelor in Computer Science and Engineering in the Universidad Carlos III de Madrid (UC3M)
studies.content: Bachelor in Computer Science and Engineering with minor in Computer Science and a thesis called 'Adversarial Design in the Videogame Industry'

studies.title: MSc. Human-Centered Artificial Intelligence en la Danmarks Tekniske Universitet (DTU)
studies.content: Studying my masters in Kongens Lyngby, Denmark

proyects.title: Bachelor Thesis: Adversarial Design for the Videogame
proyects.content: My bachelor thesis. It was about using Generative Adversarial Networks for creating new Pokémon images. The thesis is written in spanish, but the last 10 pages are an english summary. My tutor was Alejandro Cervantes, and I thank him for all the help. After my thesis defense I got a 10/10 in July, and in November I was awarded with honors.

proyects.title: COCO SSD Web app
proyects.content: An application that icorporates Tensorflow's network COCO SSD in a web app using Tensorflowjs. Is an small and simple app to learn how to use pretrained neural networks in non-Python frameworks, allowing users more interaction.

proyects.title: Animal Sound Classsifier
proyects.content: Final Project for the course of Deep Learning at DTU. It is a neural network approach, using hierarchical classification, to the problem of classifying different animals based on its sound.

proyects.title: PokemonBattleBot (in development)
proyects.content: Attempt of creating a Pokémon Battle Bot that can play in the Smogon's Pokémon Showdown. I'm trying to create different bots using multiple strategies and artificial intelligence methods.

proyects.title: Hnefatafl
proyects.content: Hnefatafl, also known as viking chess, is a two playerr strategy board game where each player plays a different role. I wanted to do this to learn p5.js, and have fun with a relaxed project.

proyects.title: Saving Universe 616
proyects.content: Final Project for the course of Social Graphs and Interactions at DTU. We created and analysed a graph made of different characters from the Marvel Universe 616, in an attemp to obtain relevant information from it.

proyects.title: Pheithar Web Page
proyects.content: This is this webpage :). This webpage is made from a template I created with ttwo collegues, and it has a few changes to make it my own. It's developed in Angular.

proyects.title: WebCVtemplate
proyects.content: Template of this webpage. I did it with two collegues to create each one of us our own webpage and learn more Angular at the same time.

proyects.title: Password Generator
proyects.content: Small password generator that allows different parameters using 'flags'. I used it to learn bash script and entertain myself one afternoon.
